DOC.brief_summary: EORTC-QLQ-30 questionnaire filled in by participants 6 times
DOC.brief_title: Symptoms Experienced and Quality of Life in Breast Cancer Receiving Radiotherapy
DOC.detailed_description: EORTC-QLQ-30 questionnaire filled in by participants 6 times - 1st before receive radiotherapy - 2nd after receive radiotherapy - 3th 1 month after receive radiotherapy - 4th 3 month after receive radiotherapy - 5th 6 month after receive radiotherapy - 6th 1 year after receive radiotherapy
DOC.criteria: good consciousness ability to understand and provide information no hearing impairment Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance level of 0 to 2 prior radiotherapy
